todo-app.detailed_description: A comprehensive to-do list application built to showcase fundamental concepts of state management and component-based architecture. Users can add, delete, and mark tasks as complete, with all data persisting in local storage.

website-yasakayara.detailed_description: A professional company profile website for PT. Yasakayara Group Perkasa. This project was developed to enhance the company's online presence, featuring a responsive design, service showcases, and a contact form for inquiries.

InsightEdu.detailed_description: InsightEdu is an educational platform designed to provide interactive learning materials. This project integrates various technologies to deliver a seamless and engaging user experience for students and educators alike.
